metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9038 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: wp-includes/http.php in WordPress before 3.7.5, 3.8.x before 3.8.5, 3.9.xbefore 3.9.3, and 4.x before 4.0.1 allows remote attackers to conductserver-side request forgery (SSRF) attacks by referring to a 127.0.0.0/8resource.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
